About

Hello I'm Alessandro Ammendola and I’m 26 years old , I live in San Giuseppe Vesuviano, a little town in Campania, Italy. I ‘m studying computer engineering at University Federico II of Naples and currently I’m attending the iOS Developer Academy . .

I challenged myself in many ways, every experience I made has increased my technical and soft skills. I discovered that UX and UI Design are what I love the most.!
